modName: Roc Iron-Crusher - Two Handed Sword Specialist
summary: Roc Iron-Crusher is a new follower located in the living quarters of Jorrvaskr. He likes to crush things for you!
descriptionHtml:
Roc Iron-Crusher is a new follower located in the living quarters of Jorrvaskr. He\'s joined the companions recently, and he\'s been a natural fit due to his size and abilities with two-handed swords. He should be compatible with all follower mods. I use UFO and My Home is Your Home and he works with both just fine. I created him mainly to use with things like UFO so that I could add to my horde of followers so hopefully he\'ll be a welcome addition to join your army!

[color=orange]Note:[/color] Smaller file size is uploaded.

[color=Yellow]Installation:[/color]

[color=Yellow]Immersive Armors already installed:[/color] Install Roc and when prompted, say No when asked to overwrite files.

[color=Yellow]Immersive Armors not installed:[/color] Install Roc like any other mod.

Mods used to create Roc:

Einherjar Armor by Omesean
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12693

Warchief Armor by Hothtrooper44
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13366

FrankDema Travel BackPack by FrankDema
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23913

All mods used with permission. If you want to modify Roc, please feel free with the understanding that you\'ll need Hothtrooper44\'s permission if you wish to continue using the Warchief Armor and FrankDema\'s permission if you wish to continue using the back pack. Omesean allows the use of his armors as long as credit is given and no uploads are done outside of the Nexus or Steam Workshop. Please respect their wishes if you change Roc. My wishes for changes to Roc are simply:
1. Let me know
2. Send me a link to your new version
3. Credit me where appropriate
author: Kain3883
